casebody.data:
McGeary et al., Appellees, v. Brocker et al., Appellants.

[Cite as McGeary v. Brocker (2002), 94 Ohio St.3d 440.]

(Nos. 01-398 and 01-867 Submitted January 29, 2002 Decided March 20, 2002.) Martin F. White Co., L.P.A., Martin F. White and James J. Crisan, for appellees. Harrington, Hoppe & Mitchell, Ltd., James L. Blomstrom and John T. Dellick, for appellants.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed pursuant to R.C. 2505.02(B)(3) because the vacating of a summary judgment is a final appealable order.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
